Package index

Write

write_dataframe_to_db()
Write an R data frame to a SQL Server table

Read

read_table_from_db()
Read a SQL Server table into an R dataframe

Modify

add_column()
Add a Column to an existing database table
delete_table_rows()
Delete rows from an existing database table
drop_column()
Drop a Column from an existing database table
drop_table_from_db()
Drop SQL Server table from database
rename_table()
Rename a table in the database
rename_column()
Rename a column in an existing database table

Metadata

db_table_metadata()
Return metadata about an existing database table
show_schema_tables()
Show all tables (and optionally views) in a schema

Database other

create_sqlserver_connection()
Create a connection to a SQL Server database
execute_sql()
Connect, execute SQL in SQL Server database and then disconnect
